title: Schedule VI: Terms and Conditions of Service of the Officers and Employees of the Board
description: Schedule VI sets out the framework governing the officers and employees who support the work of the Data Protection Board of India. While the Chairperson and Members make high-level decisions, the officers and employees form the operational machinery â€” handling investigations, processing complaints, maintaining the digital office, and carrying out day-to-day administration.
